310350.userStory: As a student, I want to see how long a study room is available so that I can choose one and study accordingly.
As a user, I want to filter products in a price range, so that I can find one within my budget.

315594.userStory: As a user, I want to see a motivating message when I complete a task, so that it motivates me to complete the remaining tasks
As a user, I want to be able to launch a timer whenever I'm working on a task, so that I can track the total time spent on each task and better manage my time

315696.userStory: As a user, I want to set reminders for my ToDos so that I receive notifications when a task is due.
As a user, I want to set recurring ToDos (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly) so that I can automatically keep track of repetitive tasks without creating them manually each time.

316029.userStory: As a busy student, I want the app to categorize my tasks by urgency and importance so that I can focus on the most urgent tasks first.
As an unorganized student, I want the app to automatically transfer due dates to my calendar so that I can see them on my lock screen.

324390.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to create a new task with a title and optional description so that I can keep track of things I need to accomplish. -> Acceptance Criteria:  - A user can enter a task title (required) and an optional description. - The task is added to the list of active tasks once created. - The user receives confirmation that the task has been successfully added.

As a user, I want to be able to mark tasks as completed so that I can visually track my progress and know which tasks are done.  -> Acceptance Criteria:   - A user can click a checkbox or button next to a task to mark it as completed. - Completed tasks should be visually differentiated from incomplete tasks (e.g., strike-through, moved to a "Completed" section). - The user should be able to undo marking a task as completed.

325520.userStory: As a sociable user, I want to access my friends' ToDo list, so that I can join them in some of their activities.
As a user, I want to personalize my ToDos with emotes, so I can easily find them and know what activity they correspond to.

326477.userStory: As a new user, I want to be able to sign up using my Google account so that I can quickly create an account without filling out long forms.
As a current user, I want to be able to set up a password after signing up with my Google account without losing my previous account

327057.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to order my to-do list by priority so that I can see what tasks are most important.
As a user, I want to be able to delete my to-dos so that I can remove tasks that are no longer relevant.

327530.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to set priority levels for my ToDos, so that I triage which to actually do when short on time.
As a user, I want to be able to set deadlines for my ToDos, so that I can now which are pressing and which can be delayed

328216.userStory: As a user, I would like to create multiple task lists such that I can organize my tasks by different projects or categories.
As a user, I want to set reminders for my tasks such that I can ensure I never forget important deadlines.
As a user, I want to see my tasks.
As a user, I want to track my completed tasks so that I can measure my productivity.
As a user, I want to collaborate with my friends on tasks.

328225.userStory: As a user, I want to assign priority levels (e.g., high, medium, low) to my tasks so that I can focus on the most important tasks first.
As a user, I want to filter my tasks by completed, pending, or overdue status so that I can quickly see what I still need to do.

328412.userStory: As a busy person, I want to be reminded to do certain tasks, so that I don't forget them.
As an organised person, I want to add categories to my tasks, so that I can sort them.

329732.userStory: As a user, I want to tag my tasks and filter them according to the tags, so that I can choose the project on which I work.
As a user, I want to set a due date on my tasks, so that I can work on urgent tasks first.

329743.userStory: As a busy user, I want to login to my account with One tap to save my time.
As a travelling businessman, I want to know where I wrote each of my To-Do so that I can remember the context.

330258.userStory: As a user, I want to create and manage custom hierarchical categories for my ToDos (e.g., "Work" -> "Projects" -> "Project A"), so that I can effectively organize and prioritize my tasks based on their context.
As a user, I want to track my progress in completing ToDos within their specified due dates, so that I can identify areas where I need to improve my time management and productivity.

332446.userStory: As a user of the ToDoApp, I want to be able to get notifications on my phone when the deadline of the task is close so that I do not forget it.
As a user, I want to be able to create, rename, and delete folders to organize my to-do lists into different categories, so that I can manage my tasks more efficiently and stay organized.

339364.userStory: As a user I want to change the status of my tasks so that I can track their progress.

339394.userStory: As a user, I want to receive notifications as reminders when I am close to a deadline so that I can complete my task on time.

339511.userStory: As a busy professional, I want to create and categorize tasks in my To-Do list so that I can organize my day efficiently and prioritize my work.
As a forgetful user, I want to receive daily reminders for overdue tasks so that I can stay on top of my to-do list and not miss any important deadlines.

339607.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to add certain To-Dos to my public profile, so that I can share my tasks with my friends

339715.userStory: As a user, i want to reminders my to-dos, so that i can be reminded before task is due.
As a user, i want to delete my to-dos, so that i can delete task that is completed or no longer needed.

339718.userStory: As a user, I want to add tags to my to-do's so that I can better search and filter my to-do's.
As a user, I want to be able to have multi-stage to-do's so I can add more complex and layered tasks to the app.

339815.userStory: As a user, I want to group my tasks into categories, so that I can organize my tasks purposefully.
As a user, I want to receive a notification when a task is due, so that I can complete it on time.

339839.userStory: As a user, I want to set reminders for my tasks so that I don’t miss important deadlines and stay organized
As a user, I want to be able to attach files or images to my tasks so that I can reference important documents or visuals directly within the app.

340059.userStory: As a user, I want to mark the progress of a to do, so that I can see at a glance whether the task is in progress, finished, or haven't started yet.

340060.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to set priority for each to-do so that I can decide which one to do first.
As a user, I want to be able to set due date for each to-do so that I can know when to finish it.

340946.userStory: As a user, I want to do lists to be collaborative, so that I can share goals with my team and colleagues.

341201.userStory: As a user, I want to set recurring to-dos, so that I can automate repetitive tasks.

341205.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to share my to-dos with others so that I can delegate tasks to others.

341415.userStory: As a student, I want folders for to-dos so that I organize them by course or project.

341467.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to lock some ToDos with my phone's authentication method, so that only I can see them.

341660.userStory: As a user, I want to set reminders for my to-dos so that I am notified when a task is approaching its due date.

341957.userStory: As a user, I want to share my to-dos with my friends so that they can have the same tasks as I do.

341981.userStory: As a user, I want to organize my ToDos by priority so that I can see the most important ones first.

341989.userStory: As a user, I want to set priority levels for my tasks, so that I can focus on completing the most important ones first.

342062.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to share certain TODO tasks so that I can coordinate tasks with multiple people at the same time.

342289.userStory: As a new user, I want to have an intuitive interface so that I don't lose time in a tutorial.

342605.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to share my ToDos with other peers so that I can collaborate with them on the same project.

342757.userStory: As a user, I want to mark my tasks as complete, so that I can track the progress of my tasks.

342896.userStory: As a user, I want to receive reminder notifications for my ToDos, so that I can be alerted about upcoming tasks without needing to open the app.

344200.userStory: As a user, I want to filter or search my ToDos, so that I can quickly find specific tasks by name, category, or date.
As a user, I want to share my ToDos with other users, so that we can collaborate on tasks or projects.

344314.userStory: As a user, I want to receive notifications reminding me of my unfinished to-dos for the day, so that I don't forget to complete them on time.

344316.userStory: As a user, I want to set reminders for my to-dos, so that I get notified about tasks before they are due.

344697.userStory: As an admin, I want to view a summary of users who logged in with Google, including their email and location, with the option to filter by region and export the summary as a CSV, so that I can analyze where the app is being used.

345101.userStory: As a user, I want to get notified one day before my to-dos' due dates, so that I don't forget about them.
As a user, I want my achieved to-dos to be put in a separate list, so that I keep up with what has and still hasn't been done.

345159.userStory: As a user, I want to mark a task as completed, so that I can visually track which tasks I have finished.
As a user, I want to set a due date for each task, so that I can prioritize tasks based on deadlines.

345164.userStory: As a user, I want to prioritize my to-dos, so that I can work on my most important or urgent ones, making it easier to concentrate on the essentials.
As a user, I want to receive notifications on short deadlines, so that I can stay on track with my schedule.

345232.userStory: as a team leader , I want to share my tasks to other persons so that we can manage tasks as a team
as a absent-minded person, I want reminder notifications for the tasks which the due date is coming soon so that I don't forget to do them

345291.userStory: As a user, I want to share my ToDos with my friends, so that we can work on a common project.
As a user, I want a history of my ToDos, so that I can keep track of my productivity.

345375.userStory: As a power user, I want to be able to create multiple lists of ToDos so that I can sort and organise my tasks by type.
As a busy user, I want to be able to set a deadline for my tasks and export them in my usual calendar app so that I can visualise my deadlines.

345472.userStory: As a user, I want to organise my ToDos by topics, so that I can easily organise and filter them.
As a user, I want to be able to share my ToDos with other users, so that I can collaborate on them.

345507.userStory: As an indecisive user, I wish I could talk to an AI through the app so that it could help me organise my "TODO" tasks
As a manager, I would like to be able to create groups and assign ToDos to my team to improve collaboration

345556.userStory: As a user, I want to set deadlines for my to-dos, so that I can make sure I complete them in time.
As a user, I want to rate my to-dos on a scale from 1 to 5, so that I can prioritize and choose the order in which to complete them.

345769.userStory: As a user, I want to sort the ToDos by their due date, so that I can prioritise tasks that are approaching their deadline and stay organised.
As a user, I want to mark ToDos as done, so that I can track which tasks are completed, pending, or overdue.

346017.userStory: As a user, I want to share a ToDo with other users, so that we can collaborate on tasks.
As a user, I want to archive completed ToDos, so that I can keep my list of tasks clean and organized.

346148.userStory: As a user, I want to be reminded for my upcoming deadlines/ToDos so that I can stay on track with my work. Acceptance criteria: 1. The user should be able to set a deadline for each ToDo. 2. The user should be able to set a reminder for each ToDo. 3. The user should receive a notification when the deadline is approaching (customizable : 1 day before/2 hours before/etc.). 4. The user should receive a notification when the reminder time is reached/passed and the task still hasn't been completed. 5. The user should be able to see the list of upcoming deadlines in the app.

As a user, I want to be able to add people to each ToDo, so that I can collaborate with others on my work and make the tasks appear in their app. Acceptance criteria: 1. The user should be able to add existing users and external users (inviting them to sign-up to the app) via email to each ToDo. 2. The user should be able to see the list of people added to each ToDo. 3. The people added to a ToDo should be able to see the ToDo in their app. 4. The people added to a ToDo should be able to update its status (mark as ongoing, completed, etc.). 5. The people added to a ToDo should receive notifications for the ToDo's deadlines and reminders.

346469.userStory: As a user with a busy schedule, I want to categorize my ToDos by priority so that I can better focus on urgent and important tasks.
As an absent-minded person, I want to receive a reminder for my Todos when they are due, so that I don't miss any important tasks.

346481.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to archive a ToDo, so that I can keep a ToDo for later without this ToDo distracting me from the other ToDo.
As a user, I want to be able to reorder the ToDos, so that I can order my ToDos depending on their priority to improve my organization.

346511.userStory: As a user, I want to have a calendar view for my tasks, so that I can easily plan and see what I have to do on a specific day.
As a user, I want to organize my tasks with labels, so that I can easily find all tasks related to a specific topic.

346571.userStory: As a user, I want to sort my ToDos by due date, so that I can prioritize the most urgent tasks on my list.
As a user, I want to modify my ToDos, so that I can fix mistakes I made while creating them.

346586.userStory: As a user, I want to mark a task as complete so that I know I've done it.
As a user, I want to set different priority to my tasks so that I can focus on the most important ones.

346838.userStory: As a user, I want to add a tag to some of my To-Dos and filtering, so that I can filter them by their tag.
As a user, I want to sort my To-Dos, so that the most important for me appears on top.

346981.userStory: As a user, I want to share my To-Do list with other people, so that I can split tasks to be done in the office with my coworkers. Acceptance criteria: - The To-Do appears as "collaborative" on the list. - I can send the link of my To-Do to people via gmail (if they have a google account), or by copying it to my clipboard. - Users that are connected and on my To-Do page appear on the top right as clickable logos with their profile. - I can give people permissions, like "admin" (they can edit and view) or "reader" (they can only view), and it appears underneath their profile when clicked on.

As a user, I want to have a calendar with my To-Do's where bullets appear at the time of their due date, so that I know where I stand on my schedule and I can organize my time better. Acceptance criteria: - The bullets appear with their respective To-Do title, and with its To-Do associated color to differentiate same bullets in different lists). - The bullets are duplicable for other days by clicking on a button in their details page (with the choice of them being in the same To-Do or not), to handle weekly or daily chores for example. - Bullets can be postponed (button in the details page), if the user missed the due date. - A notification is sent to the user (they can disable them in settings) if a bullet's due date is in less than one day.

347041.userStory: As a user, I want to receive reminders for my to-dos so that I can meet deadlines effectively.
As a user, I want to set recurring to-dos so that tasks that repeat daily, weekly, or monthly are automatically created.

347105.userStory: As a team member user, I want to share specific to-dos with other users so that we can collaborate on tasks and complete them together.
As a routine-driven user, I want to set recurring to-dos for tasks that happen regularly so that I don’t have to manually create the same task over and over again.

347124.userStory: As a user, I want to set reminders for my ToDos, so that I can be notified about tasks before their due dates.
As a user, I want to create recurring ToDos, so that I don't have to manually create new ToDos for repetitive tasks.

347219.userStory: As a user, I want to set reminders to my todos, so that I don't forget important tasks.
As a user, I want to search for todos by keyword, so that I can quickly find a specific tasks.

347407.userStory: As a user, I want to assign priority levels (e.g., "High," "Medium," "Low") to my to-dos so that I can automatically reorder tasks by importance and focus on the most critical ones first.
As a user, I want to assign locations to my to-dos and view them on a map, so that I can efficiently plan my work based on their geographical proximity.

347446.userStory: As a user, I want to assign a priority to my to-dos so that I can quickly identify the most important tasks.
As a user, I want to receive a notification when a pending task is about to be overdue so that I do not miss or forget a task.

347477.userStory: As a team member, I want to share tasks with my colleagues so that we can collaborate on projects more effectively.
As a user, I want to receive reminders for upcoming tasks so that I don't miss important deadlines.

347492.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to filter tasks by time consumption, so that I can chose a task compatible with my available time.
As a user, I want to assign a priority level to tasks, so that I can focus on tasks with highest prority.

347508.userStory: As a user I would like to be able to have a way to assign a priority to some tasks so that I can better know throughout the day which task should be given higher priority

As a user I would like to be able to set due date for my todo and have a notification system which would remind me when a task is about to be overdue, so that I can avoid forgetting to complete tasks.

347516.userStory: As a user, I want to set a priority level for each to-do, so that I can organize my tasks based on their importance. Acceptance Criteria: 1. The user can select from priority levels (High, Medium, Low) when creating a to-do. 2. The priority is displayed next to the to-do in the list. 3. The to-do list can be filtered or sorted by priority.

As a user, I want to receive notifications for upcoming to-do due date, so that I can complete tasks on time. Acceptance Criteria: 1. The user can enable or disable notifications for a specific to-do. 2. A notification is triggered a set time before the due date. 3. Notifications display the title and due date of the to-do.

347572.userStory: As an older user, I want to be able to calibrate the font size to be able to read the content the application is showing me better.
As a user I want to be able to create a hierarchy of to dos so I can have my shopping as a to do and the shopping list inside that to do.

355522.userStory: As a new user, I want to be shown a tour of the app's features, so that I can quickly start using the app properly.
As a user that uses the app both privately and at work, I want to create and switch between multiple profiles, so that I can sort ToDos by context.

357154.userStory: As a user, I want to receive notifications, so that I can get reminded of my ToDos before a deadline
As a team member, I want to share a ToDos list, so that we can better plan our work as a team

357236.userStory: As a business professional I want to be able to create multiple different lists of ToDos, so that I can separately keep track of my work and personal tasks.
As a user I want to be able to receive notifications based on the severity and importance I assigned to my ToDos, so that I do not forget any major task.

357241.userStory: As a user, I want to assign priority levels to my to-dos, so that I can easily focus on the most important tasks.
As a user, I want to set reminders for my to-dos, so that I receive notifications when tasks are due and stay on top of my deadlines.

357248.userStory: As an online shop customer, I want to be able to see reviews of products so that I can be sure of the quality of the product before I buy it.
As a streaming service user, I want to generate a monthly report of the movie genres I watched so that I can see what I watched the most.

357403.userStory: User Story: As a user, I want to list my ToDos in order of importance, so that I can prioritize and start with the most important tasks first.
User Story: As a user, I want a satisfying visual or sound effect to play every time I finish a task, So that I can feel a sense of accomplishment and stay motivated to complete more tasks.

357772.userStory: As a user, I want edit or delete existing To-Do so that I can update or remove tasks that are no longer relevant.
As a user, I want to mark a To-do as complete, so that I can track which tasks I have already finished.

357825.userStory: As an on-the-go freelancer, I want the app to use my current location so that I can add location-based tasks and reminders relevant to where I am.
As a frequent traveler, I want the app to notify me when I am near a location tied to a task so that I can complete tasks without having to constantly check the app.

357838.userStory: As a user, I want to add a deadline to a task, so that I’m aware of its priority.
As a user, I want to be able to set reminders for a specific task, so that I can complete it before its deadline.

358017.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to set due dates to my ToDos, so that I can keep track of when tasks need to be completed.
As a user, I want to assign priority levels to my ToDos, so that I can focus on the most important tasks first.

358100.userStory: As a user, I want to see my ToDos due date in my phone's calendar so that I can easily see my work for the week.
As a user, I want to get notifications when I'm getting close to the due date of my ToDos, so that I don't forget to do them.

358113.userStory: As a user, I would like to receive reminders for my tasks such that I can ensure I complete them on time.
As a user, I would like to create tasks which are linked to a specific location such that I can get reminders while passing through those places.

358115.userStory: As a user, I want to filter my to-dos by categories, so that I can easily view and prioritize my tasks based on closest due date, nearest location, or current status.
As a user, I want to receive push notifications on my device when a to-do is due within the next 24 hours, so that I can be reminded to complete it on time.

358118.userStory: As a user, I want a focus mode that shows only tasks relevant to my current location, so I can avoid distractions from unrelated tasks.
As student, I want to be able to categorize tasks by subject, so I can easily find tasks related to a specific course.

358213.userStory: As a user, I want to log in to the app using my credentials so that I can securely access my personal to-do list and manage my tasks.
As an active person, I want to add new tasks with specific locations on a map so that I can visualize where each task needs to be completed and plan my route accordingly.

358245.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to share to-dos with some chosen other users so that we can work together on a shared task.
As a user, I want to start a timer on a to-do when I am working on it and stop it when I have finished so that I can track the time I spent on this task.

358440.userStory: As a team leader user, I want to assign my ToDos to team members so that the tasks are distributed efficiently.
As a user, I want to assign my ToDos deadlines and reminders so that I can complete each task on time.

358469.userStory: As a student, I would like to have push notifications to remind me when my deadlines are getting close.
As a CEO, I want my ToDo's to be separable by topic so that I am not overwhelmed by the amount of task.

358484.userStory: As an organized user, I want to prioritize my ToDos, so that I can focus on the most important tasks first.
As a collaborative user, I want to collaborate on ToDos with others, so that we can share tasks and work together more effectively.

358495.userStory: As a user, I want to view my to-dos on a calendar, so that I can better visualize the due dates and not fall behind schedule.
As a user, I want the to-do app to send notifications for upcoming to-do, so that I don't forget any imminent due dates.

359286.userStory: As a user, I want to share and update To-dos to my friends so that tasks can be done by many people at the same time
As a user, I want to configure and receive reminder to specific tasks in the To-dos so that I do not forget to do a task planned for a specific date/time

359358.userStory: As a user, I want to be notified when a To-Do deadline approaches, so that I am reminded to complete it.
As a user, I want to categorize my To-Dos into different projects, so that I can organize my tasks better.

359392.userStory: As a user, I want to want to be be able to log out of the app as to change account.
As a user, I want to be able to switch accounts to share the application with other users without having to log out or use another device.

359393.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to see my ToDos on a calender, so that I can manage my time better based on the ToDos due dates.
As a user, I want to be able to highlight the most important ToDos, so that I can choose which ToDos to accomplish first.

359826.userStory: As a user, I want to collaborate and share my to-dos with others so that we can view and edit them together.
As a user, I want to receive a notification when a task deadline is approaching, has passed, or for reminders, so that I avoid missing important tasks.

360551.userStory: As a user with many tasks, I want to sort and filter my ToDos based on priority, due date, or location so that I can manage my tasks more efficiently.
As a user who frequently travels, I want to set location-based reminders so that I am reminded to complete tasks when I arrive at specific locations.

360667.userStory: As a user, I want to set a task to repeat at regular intervals of my choosing, so that it continues until a specified end date.
As an organized user, I want to categorize my ToDos by adding tags, so that I can toggle between viewing all ToDos or only those with a specific tag.

360700.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to chain ToDos (have a new to-do I wrote before appear once another one is finished) so that I can organize my day in a successive manner and not feel overwhelmed
As an admin, I want to be able to add ToDos to multiple employees at the same time so that I can be more efficient and coordinate employees

360864.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to filter my task, so that I can separate the different types of tasks.
As a user, I want to receive notification from the app, so that I can be reminded of my tasks yet to fulfill.

361013.userStory: As a user, I want to set deadlines for my to-dos, so that I can keep track of when tasks are due and manage my time effectively.
As a user, I want to mark to-dos as completed, so that I can track my progress and keep my list organized.

361075.userStory: As a user, I want to be alerted when I am near the location of a task, so I can be reminded to complete it based on my current surroundings.
As a user, I want to share my to-do items with others, so that we can work together on tasks.

361089.userStory: As a user, I want to schedule my to-dos so that I can plan my day.
As a user, I want to have a reminder so that I can remember my to-dos.

361104.userStory: As a user, I want to set priority levels for my to-dos so that I can focus on completing the most important tasks first.
As a user, I want to set reminders for my to-dos so that I get notifications when a task is approaching its due date.

361249.userStory: As a user, I want to receive notifications for upcoming tasks, so that I can stay on top of my to-dos.
As a user, I want to filter my to-dos by status, so that I can easily see what I need to work on.

361312.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to put a time to a To Do, so that it can remind me of a meeting or event i may miss.
As an organized user, I want to be able to classify/label my Todos, so that i can prioritize some tasks over others.

361361.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to mark my ToDos as complete when I finish them, so I can track which tasks have been finished.
As a user, I want to be able to categorize my ToDos by priority level (e.g. low, medium and high priority), so I can manage my tasks based on their importance.

361384.userStory: As a user, I want to visualize my to-do lists in augmented reality around my workspace, so that I can see my tasks in my environment without looking at my phone.
As a user, I want AI to automatically break down complex tasks into smaller, actionable steps, so that I can tackle big projects more easily.

361396.userStory: As a user, I want to create ToDos using voice commands, so that I can add tasks quickly while I’m on the go or when my hands are occupied.
As a user, I want to collaborate on a ToDos list with others in real-time, so that I can share and manage tasks with my team, family, or friends.

361423.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to set reminders on my ToDos, so that I receive notifications to complete my tasks on time.
As a user, I want to sync my Todos with a calendar, so that I can see them alongside my scheduled events and deadlines.

361496.userStory: As a user, I want to see a timeline of my past and future ToDos so that I can visualize my productivity.
As a user, I want to receive notifications for upcoming due dates so that I can complete tasks on time.

361516.userStory: As a user, I want to create multiple ToDos lists, so that I can classify my tasks. Acceptance Criteria: - The user can create a list and navigate between different list of ToDos.

As a user, I want to be able to search ToDos, so that I can find particular tasks I wrote in the past. Acceptance Criteria: - The user can search from any view a particular task and access the information of this task.

361517.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to merge two lists of ToDos, so that I can consolidate tasks from different sources into a single list.
As a user, I want to share my To-Do list with another user, so that we can collaborate on tasks.

361582.userStory: As a new user, I want to receive a welcome tutorial upon first login so that I can quickly understand how to navigate the platform and use its key features.
As an online shopper, I want to save my favorite products to a wishlist so that I can easily access them later and make a purchase decision when I'm ready.

361595.userStory: As a user, I want to easily search a specific ToDo, so that I can quickly find the information I need.
As a user, I want to set due dates for tasks, so that I can be reminded of upcoming deadlines.

361629.userStory: As a user, I want to set reminders for my to-dos, so that I can receive notifications before they are due.
As a user, I want to prioritize my to-dos, so that I can focus on the most important tasks.

361806.userStory: As a user, I want to have the option to export a task to my the phone's calendar app, so that I can have a time-efficient schedule.
As a user, I want to be able to set recurrent tasks which reappear daily, weekly or monthly to my list of ToDos, so that I don't have to re-enter the same tasks every time.

361831.userStory: As a user, I want to receive notifications about upcoming ToDos, so that I can ensure that I complete them on time.
As a user, I want to set priority levels for my ToDos, so that I can easily identify which ToDos are more important.

361984.userStory: As a Microsoft Outlook user, I want to have a tab with all my current subscriptions so that I can more easily unsubscribe from the newsletters that are polluting my inbox.
As a Youtube user, I want to be able to disable Youtube shorts for my account, so that I don't loose time scrolling on cats shorts.

361990.userStory: As a user, I want to categorize my ToDos using tags, so that I can filter and organize my tasks efficiently.
As a user, I want to visualize my ToDos as a progress map, so that I am motivated to complete more of them.

362178.userStory: As a user who frequently works in groups, I want to create tasks with my group members so that we can collaboratively track what needs to be done.
As a busy user, I want to assign priority levels to tasks so that I can better organize and focus on my most important work.

362180.userStory: As a user, I want to share my to-dos with other users, so that I can collaborate on tasks with my team or friends.
As a user, I want to create a new to-do using voice commands, so that I can quickly add tasks hands-free while on the go.

362239.userStory: As a busy person, I want to color-code my tasks so I can categorize tasks on my to-do list
As a professional, I want to create multiple to-do lists so I can separate my work and personal life

362246.userStory: As a user, I want to create a to-do folder so that I can group certain related to-dos together.
As a user, I want to add programmed notifications to my to-dos so that I can remember to do something at a specific time.

362262.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to duplicate a recurring task with custom intervals, so that I can efficiently manage my repetitive tasks.
As a user, I want to assign different colors to categories of tasks, so that I can quickly identify and organize them visually.

362280.userStory: As a user, I want to assign different levels of priority to my ToDos, so that I can know what ToDo I should do first.
As a user, I want to assign an expiration date to my ToDos, so that I don't waste time on a ToDo that is no longer relevant.

362341.userStory: As a user, I want to filter my ToDos by date and priority so that I can focus on the most urgent tasks.
As a user, I want to receive notifications for ToDos with upcoming deadlines so that I don't forget to complete them.

362441.userStory: As a user, I want to know how much time each pending task will consume.
As a user, I want to filter my pending tasks based on their urgency.

362572.userStory: As a user, I want to sort my tasks by due date or priority so that I can focus on what is most urgent or important.
As a user, I want to create recurring tasks so that I can automatically generate new tasks for repetitive activities.

362885.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to add to-dos from my home page so that I can easily and quickly add tasks to my to-do list.
As a user, I want to be able to tag my to-dos so that I can easily categorize and filter my to-do list.

363054.userStory: As a user, I want to receive a reminder notification so that I don't forget my tasks.
As a user, I want to be able to add colorful tags to my tasks so that I can more easily plan my priorities.

363088.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to assign priority levels to certain tasks and colour code them, to be able to identify more important tasks.
As a user, I want to add prerequisites to tasks (task A must be completed before task B) and not be able to start task B while A is not yet completed.

363397.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to assign a priority to each task in order to better organize my important and less urgent tasks.
As a user, I want to receive notifications when a task's deadline is approaching, so that I don't forget my important tasks.

363513.userStory: As a user, I want to earn points and unlock achievements for completing tasks, so that I stay motivated and engaged with my to-do list.
As a user, I want the app to suggest to-dos based on my previous tasks and patterns, so that I can be more efficient in planning my future tasks.

363521.userStory: As a user, I want to set tasks to recur at regular intervals (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly), so that I can manage ongoing responsibilities easily.
As a user, I want to search for and filter tasks by keywords, due dates, or categories, so that I can quickly find specific tasks.

363568.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to add an icon to the task so that I can easily recognize the task.
As a user, I want to be able to see my task in a scheduled form so that I can easily understand when the task should be done.

363620.userStory: As a user, I want to separate my task in sub-parts with progress tracking so that my ToDos can better represent the tasks that I am doing and i can see how much progress I did for that task.
As a user, I want to be able to set reminders in the calendar so that I am reminded to do my ToDos.

363863.userStory: As a user, I want my to-dos to be grouped in separate priority tabs, so that I can deal with the most urgent and highest priority items first.
As a user, I want to receive a reminder once a day if I have unfulfilled to-do that are due within 2 days, so that I don't forget about any crucial tasks.

363873.userStory: As a user, I want to have notifications that reminds me which tasks I need to get done.
As a user, I want to be able to create multiples toDoLists to separate the tasks per activity.

364142.userStory: As a user, I want to set reminders for my ToDos, so that I receive notifications when tasks are due.
As a user, I want to collaborate on ToDos with other users, so that I can assign tasks to teammates and track their progress.

394326.userStory: As a very busy user, I want to be able to prioritise to-dos, so that I can focus on the most important tasks first and not be distracted by less important tasks.
As a forgetful user, I want to be able to set deadlines for to-dos which remind me before before they run out, so that I can avoid forgetting tasks or finishing them too late.

394854.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to set due dates for my tasks so that I can organize my work based on priority and deadlines.
As a user, I want to receive notifications or reminders for tasks that are nearing their due dates so that I do not forget to complete them on time.
